casebody.data:
Wheat and Others v. Wheat and Others. September 11, 1916.

Absent, Sims, J. *

Appeal from the Circuit Court of Bedford county. Nelson Sale and S. V. Kemp, for the appellants. Don P. Halsey and Landon Lowry, for the appellees.

Staunton.

Affirmed by Divided Court.

Case submitted before Judge Sims took bis seat.
